name: Disco Mouse
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, silver dungarees and a body with a matching rose by her ear.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little mouse will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting for a new adventure this little diva will make a fabulous decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 7" long

name: Hero Mouse (Purple)
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, Denim dungarees and a crystal embellished felt mask with star design on her little cape.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little mouse will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting for a new adventure this little crimefighter will make a fabulous decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 7" long

name: Bluebell Rose
description:
One of a kind, hand finished mini rag doll. Made from pre-loved fabric. Fabulous petal skirt, sleeves and hat in a textured t-shirt fabric in beautiful shades of blue with a matching hat with hand made rose/ribbon detail. Woolen hair in lovely shades of blue, white and purple. Chunky wooden bead choker and a ribbon and button around her ankle. 
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 44cm 17" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Lil Miss Groovy Pants
description:
One of a kind, hand finished ragdoll. Made from recycled materials. Face, arms and legs in a pale biege cotton, Sleeves, body and bloomers in a pretty vintage green/blue floral printed fabric, her bloomers are gathered at the back with a bow and finished with side ribbon detail. Her  hair is styled in big bunches giving her a really quirky and unique style. She has chunky wooden choker and a little button  bracelet.
 Not suitable for babies or young children she will make someone a wonderful little comanion or unique decor piece.
Approx 38cm 15" long and 5cm 2" wide

name: Bluebell Blue Pixie
description:
One of a kind, hand finished mini rag doll. Made from pre-loved fabric. Fabulous petal skirt, sleeves and hat in a textured t-shirt fabric in beautiful shades of purple with a matching hat finished with button detail. Chunky woolen hair in  funky bunches. Chunky wooden bead choker and a ribbon and button around her ankle.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 38cm 15" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Patchwork Cushion 2
description:
Made from re-cycled and vintage fabric scraps this one of a kind cushion is complete with polyester pad. Scraps of black printed, deep reds, pinks and embroidered materials all appliqued onto cover and secured in envelope style.
This charming little cushion will add Little Scrap Alice charm to anywhere it sits! 
Size approx 31cm (12") x 31cm (12" )

name: Patchwork Cushion 1
description:
Made from re-cycled and vintage fabric scraps this one of a kind cushion is complete with polyester pad. Scraps of blue and white floral material all appliqued onto cover and secured in envelope style.
This charming little cushion will add Little Scrap Alice charm to anywhere it sits! 
Size approx 31cm (12") x 31cm (12" )

name: Love Me Lovebot Pink
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, fabulous pale denim fabric with appliqued detailing on body, finished with sequin heart detail. Ribbon and button detail on head.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little LoveBot will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting to make a beautiful decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 33cm 13" long and 13cm 5" wide

name: Love Me Lovebot
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, fabulous pale denim fabric with appliqued detailing on body, finished with sequin heart detail. Ribbon and button detail on head.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little LoveBot will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting to make a beautiful decor piece or truly unique companion.

name: Very Very Violet
description:
One of a kind, hand finished rag doll. Fabulous longer length petal skirt and sleeves in soft velvet and jersey fabrics. She has hand made flower corsages with sequin detail on the skirt and shoulder. Wild woolen  mohair hair which has a purple lurex thread catching the light in a funky up do with a large corsage detail. Delicate ribbon and button bracelet and a ribbon and button around her ankle.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 43cm 17" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Daisy Daisy
description:
One of a kind, hand finished rag doll. Fabulous longer length petal skirt and sleeves in beautiful white, cream and net fabrics. She has hand made daisy corsages on the skirt and shoulder. Wild woolen  mohair hair in a funky up do with a large corsage detail. Delicate ribbon and button bracelet and a ribbon and button around her ankle.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 43cm 17" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Dreamer Rag Doll
description: One of a kind, hand finished, keepsake rag doll. Up-cycled from eye catching heavy cream furnishing fabric with metallic glitter floral design. Vintage lace trim on skirt and hand sewn butterfly effect sleeves. An expression of pure serenity is hand sewn on her face and a choker that simply reads 'DREAM' around her neck. Button and ribbon detail to her ankle. Unique hand stitched and knotted hair finish her to dreamy perfection. A wonderful decor piece as well as a keepsake. Approx 50cm (20") long.

name: Petal Posy
description:
One of a kind, hand finished rag doll. Fabulous longer length petal skirt and sleeves in printed cotton fabric. She has hand made petal corsages on the skirt and shoulder. Wild woolen  mohair hair  in a funky up do with a petal corsage detail. Delicate ribbon and button bracelet and a ribbon and button around her ankle.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 43cm 17" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Hotchpotch Dot
description:

Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 40cm 16" long and 5 cm 2" wide

name: Pink Dreams Fairy
description:
One of a kind, hand finished larger size fairy rag doll, made from recycled materials. Fabulous petal skirt and sleeves in plain, printed and sheen pink and cream fabrics.  Her larger wings are in metallic silver fabric . Her hair in cream wool with fine gold thread running though, tied in bunches and delicate sequin detail. Button and ribbon around her ankle and a statement button and bead choker.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 50 cm 20" long and 7 cm 3" wide  Wings Approx 20 cm 8"

name: Stardust
description:
One of a kind, hand finished mini fairy rag doll. Fabulous petal skirt and sleeves in eye catching and shiny  fabrics . Her wings are in a silver metallic fabric. Wild cream woolen hair in a funky up do, little silver colored star charm choker with a button and ribbon around her ankle.
Not suitable for babies or young children but will make a unique and quirky decor piece or a magical companion.
Approx 39 cm 15" long and 5 cm 2" wide  Wings Approx 13 cm 5"

name: Midnight
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, fabulous black fabric with embroidered detailing on body,arms and legs.Sheer ribbon and button detail.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little LoveBot will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting to make a beautiful decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 33cm 13" long and 13cm 5" wide

name: GothBot
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from recycled materials, fabulous silky black fabric and black and white ditsy print fabric in a funky skull and crossbones motif with a red ribbon and button detail.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this little GothBot will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting to make a cool decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 33cm 13" long and 15cm 6" wide

name: GothBot 1
description:
One of a kind , beautifully soft and full of character. Made from a fabulous fleece and sparkly silver fabric in a funky skull and crossbones motif with a silver ribbon and button detail.
A truly unique and quirky decor piece or keepsake this littleGothBot will not like being pulled around and is not suitable for babies or young children. Just waiting to make a cool decor piece or truly unique companion.
Approx 33cm 13" long and 15cm 6" wide

name: Limited edition Britbot 1
description:
One of a kind, beautifully soft and full of character. Made from fabulous mix and match red, white and blue fabrics. Union Jack ribbon and button trim.
Made to be a keepsake or decor piece this little Lovebot will not like being pulled around. A truly unique piece of Cool Britannia, shes just waiting for her new home.
Approx 33cm 13" long and 13cm 5" wide

name: Cloud Dream Doll
description:
One of a kind, beautiful and unique doll made from recycled materials.
Named by my daughter when she saw her amazing white, fluffy woolen hair which has a clear thread running through it which catches the light. I have hand sewn 3 soft blue roses and added a trim to finish the look. Her dress is fashioned from a vintage blue and white scarf (which still has the original tiny little tag on it which reads 'rain repellant') I think it just adds a little touch. Hand sewn detail of a feather like braid around top of the dress and a little ribbon choker.
A small heart button and ribbon around her wrist. Her hand sewn features give her an air of dreamy contentment. Made as a decor piece or a keepsake she is not suitable for babies or young children. Ready and waiting for a place to sit and dream! Approx 48cm (19") long.

name: Tangerine Dream Doll
description: One of a kind, hand finished, keepsake doll. This doll is a vision of retro chic with her up-cycled dress in 60s/70s orange floral print cotton. Silver coloured metal charm heart on ribbon choker and bow and button bracelet details. Her amazing hair is a rainbow mix flame coloured wool, styled in two large plaits and secured in up do! Finished with orange bow. An absolutely charming and unique decor piece or keepsake she with make a fabulous gift. Not suitable for babies or young children. Approx 50cm (20") long.

name: Blue Whisper Rag Doll
description: Hand finished, one of a kind keepsake doll. Delicate shades of powder blue with coral red details on body and in the handmade roses in hair. This doll is as delicate as a sigh with her hand sewn and knotted hair made from strips of delicate pale blue silk. The silk sleeves are hand stitched to her bodice and beautifully machine embroidered around the edge, she wears a gathered netted skirt tied with a ribbon at the back and wears a chicker with a charm that reads 'Made with love'. A button bracelet and ankle detail all add to this dolls whispy charm. A truly unique gift all ready to add her beauty and charm to somewhere new. Approx 50cm (20") long.

name: Dotty Pixie
description: Up-cycled, hand finished one if a kind pixie. Cotton fabric in fresh colours of lilac, blue and green make this little character suitable for boys and girls, soft and squishy with removable bow around neck make it suitable for younger children. Unusual and unique charm with little oyster coloured silk appliqued cheeks and felt heart eyes and mouth. Made to be loved and hugged but not pulled about. Approx 43cm (17") long.

name: Candy Hare
description: Up-cycled, one of a kind hand finished hare. Sugar sweet, candy striped cotton fabric doll, simple yet stunning gathered dress in a sugary pink/silver sheen fabric with matching hand stitched flower on her head (the edges have been singed to give an antique look). Little cord detail around her wrist with beads that read 'Candy'. Finished with ribbon and button detail on ankle. A stunning keepsake or decor piece, not a toy or suitable for babies or young children. What a stunning and unique gift. Approx 50cm (20") long.

name: Spring Blue Hare
description: Beautiful, hand finished, one of a kind hare. Up-cycled blue cotton fabric with rose print detail. Hand sewn A-line wool mix dress with felt heart and little button details. Pink ribbon and button choker, star button and ribbon detail on ankle. What a wonderful and unique gift this little hare will make. A keepsake and not a toy, unsuitable for babies or young children. All ready for a new home. Approx 50cm (20") long.

name: Happy Hare
description: One of a kind, hand finished up-cycled creation. Heavy cotton cream fabric with a large floral print in shades of sage, dusky pink and duck egg blue. Her full skirt is gathered at the back with a navy ribbon, the waistcoat is made of felted wool and hand stitched with a feature button detail. Facial expression full of character and hand sewn. This magical hare is just waiting for her new adventure. Made to be a keepsake rather than a toy she is not suitable for babies or young children. Approx 48cm (19") long.
